name: Cargills Pachchaperumal Rice
description: It is one of the most popular traditional varieties of rice grown in Sri Lanka and is also one of the most nutritious varieties of red rice found here. The grains of this crop are medium sized and turn a deep shade of red or maroon during cooking. Pachchaperumal rice is rich in protein, nutrients and considered ideal for children and those with diabetes or cardiovascular problems.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
